title: Beef samosas
ingredients: ['2 large potatoes, peeled', '150g frozen garden peas, thawed', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 bay leaf, crushed', '2 large onions, finely chopped', '500g mince', '4 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 tablespoon minced fresh root ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground cardamom', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '2 tablespoons chopped green chillies', '1L oil for deep frying', '1 packet filo pastry']
